title: Chrome and taskbar crashing when league is open
body:
After the 6.7 patch wierd stuff has been happening to my computer. If i leave the league client open and browse the internet on any browser then after a while chrome, my taskbar and the task manager stop working, what could be causing this

p.s I already narrowed down the problem to the league client

replies.body:
Hey there,

This sounds like a very odd issue and I'm unable to replicate it on my end.

Could you please download the [hextech toolkit](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/HTK_Setup.msi), select your region and language and run it with the default settings.

Take the saved logs (By default saved to your Desktop as LoL-Logs.zip) and [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) for Player Support to look into.
